title: Template: Software Engineer — Montreal (en-CA)
html:
Template — Software Engineer in Montreal (en-CA)

ATS‑ready template localized for en-CA. Use action verbs and quantify impact.

  • Optimized core module; reduced latency by 28%.
  • Built CI/CD; accelerated releases from weekly to daily.
  • Collaborated with cross‑functional teams to hit milestones.
